predicate.note: Frames file for 'outshine' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to be more splendid or successful

example.name: transitive
example.text: Afterward , as the A 's toasted their victory with beer ( they dispensed with traditional champagne showers in deference to the quake victims ) , Stewart said [0] he thought [0] his championship-team ring would outshine his individual trophy .
